column4: Hi all, I've just installed 10.10 and, after installing chromium-daily, chromium will crash without any error just when I open a new website
does anyonwe have a clue on this?
i use daily in lucid its been rock solid for a while.... but it is a daily updated ppa with sanpshot of current development its bound to be buggy
I know but since the upgrade it's became messy
